alert.note: Alert for Color Country Mountains; Grand Staircase; San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 19 at 1:55PM MDT until May 19 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 489, 496, AND 498... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 489 San Rafael Swell, Fire Weather Zone 496 Color Country Mountains and Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...West 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Gusts to 60 mph are possible across Fire Weather Zone 489 San Rafael Swell. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...7 to 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are expected. Any new fire starts could spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidity can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Color Country Mountains; Grand Staircase; San Rafael Swell
